aurelienribon.slidinglayout
Class SLKeyframe

java.lang.Object
  aurelienribon.slidinglayout.SLKeyframe

public class SLKeyframe
extends java.lang.Object

A keyframe wraps a layout configuration together with various parameters, such as the ending and starting sides of new and old components, and the optional delays that can be applied to the components to create some nice effects.

Author:
Aurelien Ribon | http://www.aurelienribon.com/

Nested Class Summary
static interface SLKeyframe.Callback
          A simple callback, yeah.

Constructor Detail

SLKeyframe

public SLKeyframe(SLConfig cfg,
                  float duration)
The duration parameter controls the duration of the transition of a component from its current place to its target place in the keyframe layout configuration. It doesn't account for any optional delay you may add to it.

Method Detail

setStartSide

public SLKeyframe setStartSide(SLSide side,
                               java.awt.Component... cmps)
Sets the side of the screen from where the given new components will slide from. A new component is a component that is present in this layout configuration but not on the previous one.

setStartSideForNewCmps

public SLKeyframe setStartSideForNewCmps(SLSide side)
Sets the side of the screen from where every new component will slide from. A new component is a component that is present in this layout configuration but not on the previous one.

setEndSide

public SLKeyframe setEndSide(SLSide side,
                             java.awt.Component... cmps)
Sets the side of the screen from where the given old components will slide to. An old component is a component that is not present in this layout configuration but was on the previous one.

setEndSideForOldCmps

public SLKeyframe setEndSideForOldCmps(SLSide side)
Sets the side of the screen from where every old component will slide to. An old component is a component that is not present in this layout configuration but was on the previous one.

setDelay

public SLKeyframe setDelay(float delay,
                           java.awt.Component... cmps)
Sets the delay used by the given components before the transition from their current place to their target one starts.

setDelayIncr

public SLKeyframe setDelayIncr(float delay,
                               java.awt.Component... cmps)
Sets the delay used by the given components before the transition from their current place to their target one starts. The delay is increased for each component in the list.

addDelay

public SLKeyframe addDelay(float delay,
                           java.awt.Component... cmps)
Increases the delay used by the given components before the transition from their current place to their target one starts.

addDelayIncr

public SLKeyframe addDelayIncr(float delay,
                               java.awt.Component... cmps)
Increases the delay used by the given components before the transition from their current place to their target one starts. The delay is increased for each component in the list.

setCallback

public SLKeyframe setCallback(SLKeyframe.Callback callback)
Sets a callback that will be called at the end of the transition to this keyframe.s

getDelay

public float getDelay(java.awt.Component cmp)
Gets the delay associated to the given component.

getCallback

public SLKeyframe.Callback getCallback()
Gets the callback associated with this keyframe, if any.

getDuration

public float getDuration()
Gets the duration of the transition to this keyframe.
